name: Chained Escape
summary:
🔥The Magma Meltdown Update is Here!🔥
Chained Escape just turned up the heat with the all new Magma Meltdown Update.

Face the fiery challenge of the Thermal Blast Sector, where the floor is lava and every step could be your last! Test your survival skills in escape mode, or race against friends in Versus Mode to see who can beat the heat first!

This is Chained Escape’s hottest breakout yet!

⛓️ Linked by Chains, Bound by Fate ⛓️
"Chained Escape" is an immersive VR game where players control penguins...
